tha-ap343:0.3_0: Hearing his speech, the most senior monk, the middle of the senior monks.
tha-ap343:1.2_0: who has gone beyond all things.
tha-ap343:1.3_0: By developing rebirth in this or that state,
tha-ap343:10.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap343:10.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap343:10.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap343:11.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piyadiya.
tha-ap343:12.1_0: The first with the senior monks.
tha-ap343:2.2_0: I’ve seen the heaven of the Buddha,
tha-ap343:2.3_0: but now he has fallen to pass away,
tha-ap343:3.3_0: He is born from a lower realm,
tha-ap343:5.1_0: Like a lump of fancy hair,
tha-ap343:9.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
